title: Red Team Operation
description: A red team is tasked with simulating a real-world adversary by attempting to breach the company and achieve a specific objective (e.g., access the CEO's email) without being detected.

tasks.description: Gain initial access through a targeted spear-phishing campaign.
tasks.expected_outcome: The red team successfully compromises an initial workstation.

tasks.description: Perform slow, low-profile lateral movement over several days to escalate privileges and move closer to the target.
tasks.expected_outcome: The red team successfully moves through the network while evading detection by the SOC.

tasks.description: Achieve the objective of accessing the CEO's mailbox and exfiltrating a single, non-sensitive email as proof.
tasks.expected_outcome: The red team successfully achieves its objective, demonstrating a significant flaw in the company's defense-in-depth.
